thread.title: How ISIS makes more than a million dollars a day PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: How ISIS makes more than a million dollars a day | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: How ISIS makes more than a million dollars a day PBS NewsHour
text: In Iraq and Syria, the Islamic State finances much of its military from siphoning and selling oil, amounting to more than a million dollars a day, according to estimates. Erika Solomon, a reporter for the Financial Times, joins Hari Sreenivasan from Chicago to discuss.
